content.raw:
Yeah, another point of reference are the ROS2 cppcheck linters, which [check headers](https://github.com/ament/ament_lint/blob/master/ament_cppcheck/ament_cppcheck/main.py#L51).

I found a other discussions online where it is recommended that headers don't be checked directly though, [like this one](http://cppcheck.sourceforge.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=222). But I also found comments which [imply](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/39316884/cppcheck-skips-hpp-files#comment65967163_39317171) that header files will be checked if they're included in source files that are being checked, but I did some manual testing and that doesn't seem to be true.
